content: Hi @Oliver Bertuch I was just revisting my approach to load the sample data when initializing a Dataverse environment using docker compose and platys. I have seen your PR a few weeks ago and today I looked at it in more detail. It would be very handy to get these changes merged: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse-sample-data/pull/14, as it both includes the necessary env variables as well as the API_TOKEN lookup.
